title: Samsung teases new 'clamshell' foldable smartphone
text:
San Francisco (CNN Business) Samsung's first shot at a foldable phone is off to a bumpy start, but it appears the company has more plans for the concept in the pipeline.

Samsung SSNLF The company teased at its annualDeveloper Conference on Tuesday a mobile device with a "clamshell" form factor. In a video showed on stage, the Galaxy Fold smartphone transforms from a flip phone that opens vertically to one that expands horizontally.

Samsung didn't provide too many details on the concept, but a Samsung spokesperson confirmed it is "working on advancing new foldable form factors and bringing a new foldable device to market."

In April, several reporters given early access to the $2000 device discovered defective hinges and that their screens broke after removing the Fold's protective film. Samsung responded by delaying the original launch of the device.
